title: Colorful Macchiato!: Mahou Shoujo wa Tatakawanai.
original_name: カラフル・マキアート！―魔法少女は戦わない。―
sinopse:
When she got into a pinch on the day of her high school entrance ceremony, Momose Minori transformed into a magical girl! Together with her classmate Shiori, will she join the magical girl club her seniors founded...?

(Source: MU)
